title: The Science Fair Disaster
setting: Aarav's messy bedroom with science experiment supplies scattered around
learning_or_struggle: Aarav learns the importance of following instructions after his volcano experiment explodes

title: The Friendship Bracelet Mishap
setting: Aarav's backyard under a sunny sky with a table full of colorful beads
learning_or_struggle: Aarav realizes the value of honesty when he accidentally ruins his friend's bracelet

title: The Soccer Tryouts
setting: The neighborhood park filled with cheering parents and excited kids
learning_or_struggle: Aarav discovers the power of perseverance when he struggles during soccer tryouts
